source.name: Custom mask for image compositing
source.instructions: **When using a custom mask for image compositing, the black areas of the mask will take the corresponding pixels from `image1`, while the white areas will take the pixels from `image2`.**
source.guidance: True. When using a custom mask for image compositing, the black areas of the mask will indeed take the corresponding pixels from `image1`, while the white areas will take the pixels from `image2`. Gray areas of the mask will result in a blend of the two images, allowing for smooth transitions and visually appealing compositions.
